name: antrax
description: simple practical ancient greek analizer for Biblos.js
Author: Michael Bykov <m.bykov@gmail.com>

scripts.build_: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel -s true src -d dist
scripts.wktverb: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -g $FILTER -c -R dot -b --timeout 5000 'dist/test/wkt_verb.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
scripts.comp_verb: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -g $FILTER -c -R dot -b 'dist/test/**/comp_wkt_verb.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
scripts.wktname: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -c -R dot -b --timeout 5000 'dist/test/wkt_name.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
scripts.wktadj: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -c -R dot -b --timeout 5000 'dist/test/wkt_ad.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
scripts.wktadv: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -c -R dot -b --timeout 5000 'dist/test/wkt_adv.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
scripts.wktpart: yarn run buildtest && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -g $FILTER -c -R dot -b --timeout 5000 'dist/test/wkt_part.test.js' --compilers js:babel-register --check-leaks --no-deprecation
